title: 2025 AFCON jerseys:  ‘An opportunity to bring some light' on brands' work
summary: As with every tournament- the Africa Cup of Nations is also notable for the uniforms worn by the players of the different nations - whose jerseys celebrate the diversity of cultures. For more on this, FRANCE 24’s Catherine Viette is joined by Matthieu Morge Zucconi - fashion editor at Le Figaro newspaper.
